concept.title: AI Usage
concept.shortdesc: Discover how Artificial Intelligence (AI) was used in this project.

conbody.p: AI was an excellent learning partner and researcher on the Dweb stack. Copilots prototyped and refactored code, helped debug, performed code reviews and scanned error logs.

ul.li: Provided concise summaries to help compare different dweb technologies
Up-to-date knowledge on latest dweb technology
Interactive learning partner when prompted with learning objectives
Vetted early stage designs. Fed the design document a few times and got feedback
Used AI suggestions to get to 2 star Linked Data
Coded the first abstract layer for the Plugin object by feeding in my existing code and the providing DeepSeek-R1 prompts.
Used for prototyping Python and helped set up Github actions

strow.stentry: Open AI GPT-4o,GPT-4, GPT-3.5, GitHub Copilot, Anthropic Claude 3.5 Sonnet, VS Code Copilot, Microsoft Copilot all performed well. Llama. TBD: Gemma, Mistral, SmolLM2.

ul.li: Adding XML tagging with auto-complete in VS Code
